channel.title: Need help making a private server on a laptop!
channel.description:
help please i made ian account on no-ip and added a host now i dont no what to do and how to port forward and the rest. i dont have a desktop computer just a laptop i have windows vista so please help i have a aim account add message me or add me on aim im on right now screenname is
dxhotshot101 so please help :( :confused: :confused:
